column4: To learn this one kanji, I  this story  Bambi is in a cave, eating a sidedish of salad when trying to learn the kanjis. As he succeed to learn the kanji for one, you get jealous and decide to shoot him with a slingshot. At this moment you hear the police coming, so you hurriedly burn all the proofs into a fire so you remove the keywords Bambi, slingshot and fire from recommend.  So that when the police arrives, the only remaining clue is a single horizontal bar.
